course_title: Topics in Italian Culture in Italian
class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 14 - June 24, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description:
Summer. Offered through Emory Summer Abroad Program in Bologna. Cultural topics to be announced each summer. Course taught in Italian.
May be repeated for credit when syllabus changes.
prerequisites: ITAL 102 or ITAL_OX 102 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
